AddLanguage.title: Add A Language
AddLanguage.language_description: An <link>ISO 639 language code</link> followed by an <link2>ISO 3166-1 Region code</link2>. If you can't find your language, make something up! It's not important that this is strictly correct.

Translate.language_missing: 缺少您的语言？点击这里添加。

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description: Looks like we might have gotten some dirt stuck in our circuits! Please report this using the links below and try again later.
Error.report: Report this issue using <form>this form</form>, <github>through our Github page</github>, or <link>join our Discord</link> to report it there.

Ads.behind_text: Ads help keep MCCreations creating cool things! Please consider disabling your ad blocker for this site :)

Splashes.10: Did you know that this is random?

Footer.mojang_disclamer: 不是官方 Minecraft 产品。未获得Mojang 的批准或与 Mojang 相关。

CreatorSelector.confirm_remove: 再次点击以移除此创作者
CreatorSelector.username_description: The name to display on MCCreations.
CreatorSelector.handle_description: If the creator has an account on MCCreations, enter their handle here to have their profile linked.

Images.drop_zone: 拖拽图片到这里，或点击选择。
Images.invalid: 上传失败，因为文件不是有效的图片。
Images.too_large: 上传失败，因为文件过大。
Images.unknown_error: 上传失败，因为发生了未知错误。

Files.drop_zone: Drag and Drop a file here, or click to select one.
Files.invalid_file: Failed to upload because the file is not a valid zip archive.

CreateForm.title: 创建
CreateForm.missing_title: 必须包含标题才能保存内容
CreateForm.missing_short_description: 必须包含简短描述才能保存内容
CreateForm.missing_type: 必须选择类型才能保存内容

ImportForm.title: 导入
ImportForm.description: 从 Planet Minecraft，MinecraftMaps.com 或 Modrinth 导入您的现有内容。
ImportForm.missing_link: 必须添加链接才能导入内容

Navigation.beta_warning: MCCreations is currently in beta. Please leave any feedback or report any issues using <form>this form</form>, <github>through our Github page</github>, or <link>join our Discord</link> to report it there.

SearchAndFilter.search_placeholder: 搜索标题、创作者、版本等

ExtraFiles.required_description: 使该文件与主文件共同被下载

Version.add_file_description: Add any extra files required for this creation, like resourcepacks

Content.affiliate: Get a server for this {type} for 25% off
Content.logo_alt: The logo for {title}, a Minecraft {type} for Minecraft {minecraft_version} by {creator} on MCCreations

no_tags.title: 无标签
no_tags.description: 内容必须至少有一个标签

no_minecraft_version.title: 无 Minecraft 版本
no_minecraft_version.description: 内容必须有 Minecraft 版本

no_creators.title: 无创作者
no_creators.description: 内容必须至少有一个创作者

no_files.title: 无文件
no_files.description: 内容必须至少有一个文件

no_images.title: 无图片
no_images.description: 内容必须至少有一张图片。

short_description_too_short.title: 简短描述过短
short_description_too_short.description: 您的简短描述需要至少 40 个字符

description_too_short.title: 描述过短
description_too_short.description: 您的描述需要至少 100 个字符

external_images.title: 来自外部来源的图片
external_images.description: 您有来自外部来源的图片。这意味着 MCCreations 无法保证这些图片未来仍有效，或所有用户都仍能访问。我们强烈建议您将这些图片上传。

few_images.title: 图片过少
few_images.description: 更多的图片可以帮助人们更好地了解您的内容。建议您上传至少 4 张图片，包括您的 logo。

not_linked.title: 未绑定至账户
not_linked.description: 该内容未链接到 MCCreations 上的账户。这意味着您编辑该内容的权限将在24小时内过期。建议您使用账户上传内容，以便保留所有功能访问权限。

no_download_link.title: No Download Link
no_download_link.description: At least one download link is required

slug_too_short.title: Slug Too Short
slug_too_short.description: Your slug needs to be at least 2 characters

Edit.title: 标题
Edit.title_description: The primary name of your creation. Should be short and sweet!
Edit.slug_description: The unique identifier for your creation. This will be used in the URL, like mccreations.net/maps/your-slug
Edit.short_description_description: A short summary of your creation. This will be used in search results and previews.
Edit.video_url_description: A link to a video of your creation. This will replace your logo on the creation page with an embedded video.
Edit.description_description: A longer description of your creation. This will be used on the main page of your creation.

Tags.genre_description: The primary category of your creation. This gives users a very general idea of how your creation plays.
Tags.subgenre_description: The secondary category of your creation. This gives users a more specific idea of the contents of your creation.

Leaderboards.help: Learn how to setup MCCreations Leaderboards <link>here</link>. Note that leaderboards are only available for Java Edition at this time.
Leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
Leaderboards.message_text_description: Text to display to tell players to submit their score. This is sent in game when your creation ends.
Leaderboards.message_format_description: Extra formatting to add to the tellraw message. Should be formatted like "color":"green", "bold": true

Edit.translation_languages_description: Is your language missing? Click here to add it.

PopupMessage.requested_approval: Content has been requested for approval

Metadata.title: Download Data Packs | MCCreations
Metadata.description: Download the best Data Packs for Minecraft. Explore the most popular Data Packs and get ready to play! Data Packs are the vanilla equivalent of mods for Minecraft. They can add new features, change the way the game is played, and more!

Leaderboards.submit_time_description: Your time was {hours} hours, {minutes} minutes, {seconds} seconds and {ticks} ticks
